entry.title: Armeniaโs first-ever citizensโ assembly debates countryโs challenges

media:group.media:title: Armeniaโs first-ever citizensโ assembly debates countryโs challenges
media:group.media:description:
As Armenia grapples with a number of challenges, 200 people from Armenia, Karabakh and the diaspora gathered in Yerevan for the inaugural Future Armenian Convention to participate in the countryโs first citizensโ assembly. A citizenโs assembly is a group randomly selected to deliberate on important public questions. The three-day event focused on three main themes: historic responsibility, demographic challenges and Armenia-diaspora relations.

entry.title: Cheryl Thomas: โWomenโs rights are both facing steps backward and forwardโ

media:group.media:title: Cheryl Thomas: โWomenโs rights are both facing steps backward and forwardโ
media:group.media:description:
Cheryl Thomas is the Founding Director of Global Rights for Women. Since 1993, Cheryl has worked with partners around the world to promote womenโs rights and achieve effective systemic and legal reform to end violence against women and girls. Cheryl stopped by CivilNetโs studio to talk about recent steps forward โ and backward โ for womenโs rights and the fight to end violence against women. What are governments' responsibilities to end inequalities, and what has been the state of womenโs rights since the birth of the feminist movement?

media:group.media:title: ิดีซึีกีถีกีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีซึีถีจ ีกีถีทีธึีทีฟ ีฏึีถีกีต ีฉีกึีถีธึีกีฎ ีฎีกีฌึีฅึ ีธึีถีฅีถีกีฌ
media:group.media:description:
ีึีธึ. ิฑีฝีบีฅีฟ ิณีธีนีซีฏีฅีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีกีตีฝ ีฆึีธีตึีซ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีขีกีชีซีถีจ (ีดีซีถีนีฅึ 10:30 ีผีธีบีงีถ) ีซึ ีพีฅึีฌีธึีฎีธึีดีถ ีง ีึีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีซึีกีคีกึีฑีธึีฉีซึีถีถีฅึีธึีถ, ีกึีฟีกีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีฅีกีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีถีฅึีง ึ ีฃีฟีธึีธีฒ ีฌึีกีฃึีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีกีด ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีซึีถีถีฅึีจ ีซีขึีฅึ ีธีฟีกึ ีฅึีฏึีซ ีฃีธึีฎีกีฏีกีฌีถีฅึ ีกึีฑีกีถีกีฃึีฅีฌีธึ ึ ึีงีถีฝีคึีกีฏีกีถ ีถีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ีฅึ ีกีถีธึ ีคีงีด ีชีธีฒีธีพึีคีกีฏีกีถ ีจีถีคีพีฆีธึีดีซีถ, ีธึีธึ ีซีขึีฅึ ีกึีคีซึีถึ ีญีธึีฐึีคีกึีกีถีจ ีฅีฟ ีพีฅึึีธึึ ึ ึีซีถีกีฃีซีฎีจึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ิฑีดีฅึีซีฏีฅีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฌีฝีกึีกีถีซ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฃีซีฟีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ีฅึ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีตีกึีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีฅีกีถึ ีกีดีบีซีธีถีซ ีพีกึีซีน ีคีธีฏีฟ. ิณีธีนีซีฏีฅีกีถ ีฐีกีฝีฟีกีฟีฅึ, ีธึ ึ ึีซีถีกีฃีฎีซ ีคีงีด ีคีธึึีฝ ีฅีฏีธีฒีถีฅึีจ ีผีธึีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีกีฆีคีฅึีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ีฟีกึีกีฎีดีกีถ ีดีซีปีธึ ีถีฏีกีฟีกีฎ ีงีซีถ ีฆีกีตีถ ีฅึ ีซึีฅีถึ ีจีถีคีพีฆีธึีดีจ ีณีซีทีค ีกีตีค ีกีฆีคีฅึีธึีฉีฅีกีถ ีคีงีด ีธึีฒีฒีธึีกีฎ ีงึึ ิถึีธีตึีซ ีดีถีกึีฅีกีฌ ีดีกีฝีธีพ ิณีธีนีซีฏีฅีกีถ ีจีถีคีฃีฎีฅึ, ีธึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีดีงีป ีฅึีฝ ีถีธีตีถึ ึีซีถีกีฏ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีธึีฉีซึีถีถีฅึ ีฏีกีถ, ีธึีธีถึ ีกึีฅีฌีซ ีฏีจ ีญีธึีกีถีกีถ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ-ีีธึีฝีซีก, ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ-ิฑึีฅึีดีธึีฟึ ีตีกึีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีซึีถีถีฅึีธึ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีดีกีถ ีถีธึ ีฐีธีฌีธีพีธีตีฉีถีฅึีธึีถ ีฌีธีตีฝีซีถ ีฟีกีฏึิฑีตีฝ entry.title: US says Azerbaijanโs military pressure meant to advance goals in talks with Armenia

media:group.media:title: US says Azerbaijanโs military pressure meant to advance goals in talks with Armenia
media:group.media:description:
๐Azerbaijanโs calibrated military pressure is a means to advance its goals in ongoing peace talks with Armenia, according to the latest edition of the U.S. intelligence communityโs Annual Threat Assessment report. ๐Azerbaijani forces opened fire at Armenian positions in the eastern section of the border yesterday. No casualties were reported. ๐U.S. Ambassador to Armenia Kristina Kvien visited the entrance of the blockaded Lachin corridor in Armeniaโs southern Syunik region today, calling on Azerbaijan to unblock the road.
